title: LF d4+ Mid/Top
body:
We are creating a competitive team looking to become better and participate in tournament, currently consisting of bot and jungle.(bearbeitet)
We want to participate in the winter esl (Meisterschaft) qualifier or other divisions.(bearbeitet)
To become good for it we want to practice like 3-4 times a week (scrims or esl ladder)(bearbeitet)
What we want from you:
- good mic 
- able to speak english
- open to criticism
- good communication
- meta championpool
- good attitude

just add me ingame
ign: MoneyMatchMe
